summary: Expand the party payment entry app to support party master data import/lookup (via Excel) with auto-fill on party selection, add an entry location field (including auto-capture), provide a report view to select a party and see payment amount/comment/next payment date, and provide reminders/actions when Next Payment Date is due (including a tap-to-call control for the party phone number).

existing_features.title: Create a Party Payment Entry form UI that captures: Party Name, Address, Phone Number, PAN Number, Due Amount, Date (default to today), Payment, Next Payment Date, and Comments.

Implement conditional validation for Next Payment Date: when Payment is 0, prompt the user and require Next Payment Date before allowing submission; when Payment is greater than 0, Next Payment Date is optional.

Add a simple entries view in the frontend that shows a table/list of saved Party Payment Entries after submission, including Party Name, Due Amount, Date, Payment, Next Payment Date (if present), and Comments (truncated if long).
Apply a coherent, non-blue/non-purple visual theme across the app (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) suitable for a finance/data-entry tool.
Add an "Entry Location" field to the Party Payment Entry form and persist it with each saved payment entry.

Support importing party master details via Excel upload, and allow selecting a party name to auto-fill Party Name, Phone Number, Address, PAN Number, and Due Amount; if the selected party is not found, allow manual entry of those fields.
Add an in-app reminder/notification when any saved entry has Next Payment Date equal to today, and provide a direct tap-to-call action for the party phone number.

Add a new "Report" view that lets the user choose a party name and then displays that party’s saved entry details: Payment amount, Comments, and Next Payment Date (using the existing saved entries data).
Auto-capture and auto-fill the "Entry Location" field when creating a new payment entry, while still allowing manual editing if auto-capture fails or permission is denied.
Add an export option in the Report view to generate and download a PDF of the currently selected party’s report (the same rows shown in the table).
Add a print-friendly mode for the Report view so users can print the report cleanly from the browser (without app navigation chrome).
Add CSV export for payment entries: (a) export the currently selected party’s report rows from the Report view, and (b) export all entries from the All Entries view.
Improve the All Entries view with basic client-side filtering and sorting to make large datasets easier to use.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create data entry form with fields: party name, address, phone number, PAN number, due amount, date (default to today), payment, next payment date, and comment box
Add conditional logic: if payment amount is 0, require/prompt for next payment date
Add backend support to persist Party Payment Entries and retrieve them for display: define a PartyPaymentEntry record type and expose canister methods to create a new entry and list saved entries.
Add an 'Entry Location' field to the payment entry form.
Support Excel upload/import of party details (party name, phone, address, PAN, due amount) and allow selecting a party name to auto-fill details; if party not found, allow entering details manually.
Add notification/reminder when Next Payment Date is today.
Add a direct call action/icon to call the party phone number from the UI.
Update the backend Motoko canister to support storing and retrieving imported party master records for lookup/auto-fill.
Add a report view: user chooses a party and the app shows that party’s saved payment amount, comments, and next payment date (from saved entries).
Auto-capture/fill Entry Location (e.g., from device location) when creating a payment entry, instead of manual entry only.
Add an export option to generate/download the Report view as a PDF (e.g., for sharing/printing).

projectName: Party payment details entry form with conditional next payment date
